title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu displayed when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor (Photon)
OB: When a Java editor is open, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler does not display the expected popup menu, which should allow users to add breakpoints or marks.
EB: The Java editor in Photon should display a popup menu when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. This menu should provide options to add breakpoints, marks, or perform other relevant actions.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open a Java editor.
2. Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected behavior: A popup menu should appear with options to add breakpoints, marks, or perform other relevant actions.
